title: toxic players
body:
everysingle game iv had today iv had the most toxic teams iv ever had, and yes i know to just report them but it seems like reporting is not helping at all.
i personally feel that toxic players need to be punished more often cause its making a fun game into hell for alot of other players.
iv report countless players today alone just cause they just wont stop with the bad mouths and trolling, its not fun for anyone.
im only writing this because iv had this in every game iv had today and its destroying my love for league
